strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Commando is a wildcard on the battlefield, capable of turning any situation to his favor.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Blade of Cessation is risky but can build up a lot of damage by stacking Gouge.

< ! > Distant Gash can be used to safely apply stacks of Gouge to groups of enemies - take advantage of its piercing!

< ! > Proper balance of melee and ranged combat is key, and Tactical Roll grants high armor to help enter and exit battles.

< ! > Submission can be utilized as huge burst of damage, whether it be to aid in an escape or get the jump on an unsuspecting target.
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, newfound sense of humanity within.
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he returned, concluding his endless struggle.
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_LORE:
He lays to rest by a fire, setting the weapons he carries within an arm's reach. Checking his surroundings, hoping the cave he hid in would be enough shelter. Some would say, it isn't wise to be overly cautious. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>they haven't seen enough.</color>

The service pistol he got when he enlisted. Well used, dirtied, and loved. It's brought him through thick and thin, no matter which mission he took on. Some would say, only a fool would trust their weapon. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>your weapon is all you can trust.</color>

The blade of a fallen brother of war. Picked from what he could scavenge of the last of humanity he's seen. Some would say, it keeps their spirits united. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>it's to keep their spirits from joining for as long as possible.</color>

The loads of cargo that landed with him. Each item picked from a chest, keeping him alive in one way or another. Dozens of shipments to anyone but him. Some would say, they aren't his items to take. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>if he doesn't take them, then no one will.</color>

The glow of a violet light coming from deeper within the cave. Calming, warming... beckoning. Welcoming him deeper and deeper, promising safety. Some would say, what sounds too good to be true probably is. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>Faust was a wise man.</color>
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_SECONDARY_CONCUSSION_DESCRI: <style=cIsDamage>Gouging.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Agile.</style> Hold to charge a piercing sword beam for up to <style=cIsDamage>{0}% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_SPECIAL_SUBMISSION_DESCRIPT: <style=cIsUtility>Agile.</style> <style=cDeath>Rending.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Charge up</style>, then fire a barrage of up to <style=cIsDamage>6 blasts of 4x70%.</style> <style=cIsUtility>The number of shots increases with attack speed</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_SPECIAL_BOSS_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Gouging.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Charge up</style>, then <style=cIsUtility>dash forward</style> and unleash a devastating barrage of up to <style=cIsDamage>{0} slashes</style> that deal up to <style=cIsDamage>{1}% damage each</style>. <style=cIsUtility>The number of slashes increases with attack speed</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_SPECIAL_SCEPSUBMISSION_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Agile.</style> <style=cDeath>Rending.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Charge up</style>, then fire a barrage of up to <style=cIsDamage>6 blasts of 4x70%.</style>. <style=cIsUtility>The number of shots increases with attack speed</style>. 
<color=#d299ff>SCEPTER: Additionally fires up to {0} lasers which deal {2}% damage.</color>
strings.SS2_NEMMANDO_SPECIAL_SCEPBOSS_DESCRIPTIO:
<style=cIsDamage>Gouging.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Charge up</style>, then <style=cIsUtility>dash forward</style> and unleash a devastating barrage of up to <style=cIsDamage>{0} slashes</style> that deal up to <style=cIsDamage>{1}% damage each</style>. <style=cIsUtility>The number of slashes increases with attack speed</style>. 
<color=#d299ff>SCEPTER: At full charge, briefly vanish, then unleash all of your strikes at once.</color>
